pages.text: The $(mob)Cyberzombie Brute$() is a rarer variant of the $(l:cyberware_cyberzombie)$(mob)Cyberzombie$(). It is taller, tougher, hits harder and wears even more $(item)Cyberware$() than a normal $(l:cyberware_cyberzombie)$(mob)Cyberzombie$().$(p)Its spawn rate can be greatly increased by using a $(item)Radio Kit$() or any similar item.
